Sort points in the point cloud

Source: R/stages.R
sort_points.Rd

This stage sorts the points by scanner channel, GPStime, and return number in order to maximize LAZ compression. An optional second sorting step can be added to also sort points spatially. In this case, a grid of 50 meters is applied, and points are sorted by scanner channel, GPSTime, and return number within each cell of the grid. This increases data locality, speeds up spatial queries, but may slightly increases the final size of the files when compressed in LAZ format compared to the optimal compression.

Usage

sort_points(spatial = TRUE)

Arguments

spatial

Boolean indicating whether to add a spatial sorting stage.

Value

This stage transforms the point cloud in the pipeline. It consequently returns nothing.

Examples

f <- system.file("extdata", "Topography.las", package="lasR")
exec(sort_points(), on = f)
#> NULL
